name: Matteo Mille
subtitle: Chief Sales Enablement & Operations (Italy) at Microsoft
about: I'm an energetic and optimistic executive leader with strong executive experience in multinational companies, effective advisor in promising startup and active member of private and public IT institutions, I have often been involved in companies' restructuring leading change management programs while driving digital transformation activities and building customer acquisition campaigns to sell cloud solutions to fortune 1000 customers through diverse and multicultural teams.With always the same level of passion and optimism, during the over twenty five years of experience in the Information and Telecommunication industry with national and international scope, I have operated in different professional fields: from coding to consulting, from sales and marketing manager to business unit director and  I'm now leading the Chief Marketing and Operations Organization in Microsoft Italy.Out of work, when I'm not with my three kids, I enjoy diving, jogging and building and piloting ultralight planes.
experiences: Full ownership of the whole Sales Enablement, Marketing and Operations organization with the responsibility to lead the company Strategy and deliver Business results to enable customer and partner's success and digital transformation across the Country
Regional Leader Partner Development and Sales (Asia Pacific)

Business Development, Marketing and Sales responsibilities of the Partner ecosystems comprised of Service providers, System Integrators and Devices distribution, part of the Commercial Partner organization, with a coverage across Enterprise, Small, Medium and Corporate customers.
Regional Leader Solution Sales and Assessment (Asia Pacific)

Responsible of the cost and revenue targets for the Solution Assessment organization for the Asia Pacific area leading a team of Engagement Managers, Channel Marketers, Business Developers and Telesales agents
Chairman of the Italian Committee representing the SW industry for members such as Apple, Microsoft, Adobe, Autodesk, MathWorks and others, on numerous business and policy affairs.
Chief Marketing and Offering Manager (Italy and East Europe)

Together with main share holders representatives, as the marketing and offering director, he drove a deep turnaround for the IT Business Unit, enabling the further acquisition by a national System Integrator.
Chief Technology Officer and member of the Investment Committee with CEO and COO having direct responsibility on Hi Tech Company Scouting  activities
Member of the Business & Technology practice participating with engagement responsibilities in National and International customer advisory projects.
